backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing contact inquiries, user profiles, and contact details with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a fallback image replacement task with related components and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including layout, pages, components, and theme config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH‑based color variables defining light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML template setting metadata, dynamic canonical/OG URLs, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all user agents and linking to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing home, services, about, and contact URLs with priorities and frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Services, About, and Contact using a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactDeta: Fetches backend contact details and displays email, phone, address, website, and sharing UI.
frontend/src/components/site/CoverageSec: Two‑column section outlining worldwide shipping coverage and regional expertise.
Three‑step process component showing pickup, worldwide shipping, and delivery stages.
frontend/src/components/site/MarketingCa: Reusable card component for marketing content with optional icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wrapper component that renders a padded section with an inner container.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesPre: Displays a grid of service marketing cards and a button linking to the full services page.
Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, services list, contact details, and copyright.
Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu via a sheet drawer.
Page layout that wraps content with the site header and footer using an Outlet for routing.
Shows a grid of value proposition marketing cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/site/VideoSectio: Section displaying an Instagram promo header and a video with fallback image on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Mutation hook that validates inquiry data and submits it via the backend actor, refreshing inquiry queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, base typography, and a custom hero background utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company overview, mission, values, and imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero, value props, video section, services preview, and a call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Presents a services list, how‑it‑works section, and additional info on custom solutions and tracking.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read URL params (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
frontend/VIDEO_ASSET.md: Instructions for placing and replacing the home page video and fallback image in the public assets folder.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including requirements, feature list, content updates, issues, and architectural notes for the KK Euro Express website.
